title: Profile of Millennial travelers in the U.S. as of July 2016
yAxis: Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
The maximum Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score 70.3 is found at Profile Type Cultural interest and the minimum is found at Price sensitivity where Profile Type is 55.4.
There is a difference of 14.9 between the maximum Profile Type Cultural interest and minimum Profile Type Price sensitivity.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Profile Type in the x axis and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in the y axis.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
The maximum Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score 70.3 is found at Profile Type Cultural interest and the minimum is found at Price sensitivity where Profile Type is 55.4.
There is a difference of 14.9 between the maximum Profile Type Cultural interest and minimum Profile Type Price sensitivity.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score for 9 number of Profile Types.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is appeared to be the highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
The difference of Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score between the highest and lowest Profile Type is 14.9.
Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score at Profile Type Cultural interest is 70.3 , second place is Exploration hungry at 69.5, and thirdly is Food and cuisine driven traveler at 68.5.
The average Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in all 9 Profile Types is 63.36.
